name: Commune With Nature
text: By communing with primal spirits of nature, you can learn a number of facts about your immediate environs (within 1 mile of you).   You can ask a number of questions, based on the result of your Nature check, about the terrain features, plants, minerals, bodies of water, creatures, and other aspects of your surroundings.
flavorText: By communing with the spirits of the land, you know exactly where to find food, shelter, or a clue to the location of the thing you seek.
